product.shortDescription: Move with ease with the Virtuosa Wheeled Duffel. Carry handheld or wheel using the trolley handle, this style delivers the function of a duffel bag with the added convenience of wheeled luggage!

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Made with recycled fabric. All fabrics, including the lining, are created from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles.
Strap that fits over most upright luggage handles for easy transportation
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Virtuosa Wheeled Duffel | Rolling Duffel | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: The Virtuosa Wheeled Duffel combines the convenience of wheeled luggage with the functionality of a duffel bag, making travel a breeze.
product.headlineDescription:
Move with ease, this style delivers the function of a duffel bag with the added convenience of wheeled luggage.

  • Overall Dimensions: 21.5 in. x 11.5 in. x 10.25 in.
  • Weight: 3.97 lbs
